name: bakery
description: Bake fresh projects from recipes - a modular project scaffolder

scripts.build:darwin-arm64: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/bakery-darwin-arm64
scripts.build:darwin-x64: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/bakery-darwin-x64
scripts.build:linux-x64: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/bakery-linux-x64
scripts.build:linux-arm64: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile dist/bakery-linux-arm64
scripts.build:windows-x64: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/bakery-windows-x64.exe
scripts.build:binaries: bun run build:darwin-arm64 && bun run build:darwin-x64 && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun run build:linux-arm64 && bun run build:windows-x64
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run oxlint
scripts.check:all: bun run check && bun run test:coverage
